content: looking for a quick and quirky project this wavy trinket tray is the perfect blend of function and fun whether you re corralling jewelry keys or crafty odds and ends this playful little catch-all brings a pop of personality to any space grab your hook pick your favorite yarn and let s ride the wave **gauge & size ** gauge is not critical for this project the pattern was designed using cotton worsted weight yarn and a 5mm hook this hook-yarn combo made a trinket tray approximately 16cm long and 6cm wide **materials needed ** - 5mm hook - 20-30m worsted weight yarn cotton yarn works well and holds the trinket shape - 1 stitch marker
